title: RIscoper 2.0: A deep learning tool to extract RNA biomedical relation sentences from literature

tldr.text: A comprehensive and reliable corpus of RNA biomedical relations is established, recruiting over 30,000 sentences manually curated from more than 15,000 biomedical literature and RIscoper 2.0, a BERT-based deep learning tool to extract RNA biomedical relation sentences from literature is updated.
